Hello all,

We can offer VPS servers from just EUR 2.00 / month (Excl. VAT).

Uptime and stability is our main priority. That’s why we’ve built a fully redundant setup. Our storage system is based on CEPH with only the fastest Intel NVMe disks. This storage system is connected to our HA hypervisors with a fully redundant 80 GBps infiniband network, providing local-like storage performance and is triple replicated to ensure data consistency and availability.

We’re hosting from a green datacenter in the middle of Antwerp, Belgium.

256 GB Bandwidth
1 GBps shared uplink

Only € 2,00 / month (or € 20 a year with annual payment).
